entry.title: [BLACKLIGHT in the Belfry]
entry.summary:
Author: BritishRobutt

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,914Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 293

Summary: The last thing Alex Mercer sees of his New York is the bright flare of detonation as he drops the nuke into the Atlantic Ocean. Instead of dying, he wakes up to a different world with superheroes, magic, and aliens. Can someone who is both less and more than human rediscover himself and his place in the dark streets of Gotham?

entry.title: Batfamily Acidemia
entry.summary:
Author: Don454132Nie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,113Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 127

Summary: Batman and his team the Batfamily are having a normal night in Gotham City stopping villain's like Victor Zsasz when suddenly the group head out to stop a recently escaped Joker who ends up using a Device he was given by his villain "Friend" Lex Luthor that can open portals to other universes. Joker ends up sending himself, his underlings, the Batfamily, and several other villain's to another world where 80% of the population have superpowers called quirks. Now Batman must work with the number 1 hero of this worlds japan and his apprentice Izuku Midoriya to get home and stop Joker, Penguin, Two-Face, and any new allies they may find.ORThe Batfamily and several DC villain's end up in the world of MHA and Midoriya and Damian end up going to UA together while Joker, Punchline, and Scarecrow join up with the L.O.V.

entry.title: Of Coffe and Flowers(I won't run when it looks like Love)
entry.summary:
Author: InLoveWithaFairyTale

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,930Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 48

Summary: Jason Todd had nothing to live for exept spite and Gotham, maybe the Outlaws and his family counted too, not that he would admit it to anyone, least of all himself.He didn't deserve to be loved, he would NEVER risk anyone getting tangled up in his life and risk getting hurt, by him and the people that he'd made enemies with as Red Hood.He would never... entry.title: Captain of the Requiem
entry.summary:
Author: Mina-Sanno (DarkVincentFantasy)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,287Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: The Space battleship Requiem needs a captain. There must *always* be a captain - whether they are willing or not for the forces beyond space do not rest. it is a neverending battle and Requiem has gone through a thousand captains (Avatars), each soul laying their own imprint upon the ship forged from a cold star, each soul breathing power into it and information rolling over to the next Avatar. Only those the Requiem deems fit to be their Avatar and the Requiem has found their newest Avatar on Earth.... | Dick Grayson has been missing for a little over 6 and a half months ago during a nightly patrol in Bludhaven and there have been no traces left behind of any possible culprit. Bruce Wayne and the JL have tried the League of Assassins and Shadows but *nothing*. The Batfamily haven't been the same since Dick's kidnapping and there were a lot of regrets from them all. During a Justice League meeting an unknown contact breaches their security and a video recording is broadcasted in the meeting room, an unfamiliar figure with spiked up white hair and a mask gives a little wave. *"H-hey...long time no see...so this is a recording....-"*

entry.title: Languages Of A Family
entry.summary:
Author: Ghostinthecabinet

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 583Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Bruce chuckled at the article.'Gotham's Prince was seen speaking various languages to the attendees. From an in depth Spanish conversation with a young intern at Kord industry. To sweet chit chat in an Asian language with one of the younger members of the Queens, Cynthia Lance.'It was one of the most flattering articles that featured 'Wayne' in the title for some time. Yet the story was making its own ripples.

entry.title: A Nightingale's Song
entry.summary:
Author: SunflowerSky22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,649Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 8

Summary: When Kathy Jones was fourteen years old, she lost her best friend Jason Todd in a drunk driving accident. Eight years later, Kathy finds herself in a Gotham that had gone quiet. Whispers spreading that someone had taken control of the the Black Mask's associates and grabbing his territory. While the Batman and his associates try to look for answers, and Tim Drake readjusts to being a hero after years away from the field, the young hacker isn't waiting around for them to find those answers. Kathy, in the pursuit of information regarding this Red Hood figure, finds herself caught up in something she would have never imagined. In turn, finding something-someone-she had thought she lost.Or, we all have ghosts from our past, but no one actually expects those ghosts to walk out of the grave and into their house with guns blazing.

entry.title: In Alternate Relation
entry.summary:
Author: Effi_Bee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,373Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 17

Summary: As he lay on his back in the snow, his soon-to-be murderer already long gone, he couldn’t help but find this situation ironically funny. How it started this way. A bullet lodging itself into a chest. The start and -however pathetic- end of Spider-Man. He had gone full circle now. Hilarious. or Peter finds himself in Gotham City, New Jersey, and decides to start a new chapter in his (new) life, because isn't that what you do when you are supposed to be dead? You move on. ( It doesn't matter that it's not really working. It's the effort that counts.)
